org.openimaj.hadoop.sequencefile

Class TextBytesSequenceFileUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hadoop.sequencefile.SequenceFileUtility<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
      • org.openimaj.hadoop.sequencefile.TextBytesSequenceFileUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Map.Entry<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>>

    public final class TextBytesSequenceFileUtility
extends SequenceFileUtility<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
    A concrete implementation of a SequenceFileUtility for SequenceFiles with Text keys and BytesWritable values.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
